metadata.title: CVE-2019-2128 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In ACELP_4t64_fx of c4t64fx.c, there is a possible out of bounds write dueto a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID:A-132647222.

criterions.comment: vo-amrwbenc package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
